title: Lobby chat lag
body: So I main top {{champion:80}}  and it is complicated to even get a spot on top, but on top of that I have to wait because lag caused by something is keeping me from the lobby for a good extra 30 seconds. Most cases Ill get jg or sup {{champion:16}}  but most I get a position that I can barley hold down. Soo I was wondering if this happens to anyone else because if not then I need help trying to figure out what it actually is.

replies.body:
That could be an issue with your NAT or DNS. Either way, it *may* be solved by flushing your internet cache.

[Here are instructions on how to do it](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664), though just make sure that your OS is selected at the top before attempting it. If you need any help with it, just ask.

Best of luck.
